overview: Motor Works Media, LLC is proud to present the first title in its exciting new line of automotive/ pop culture titles: Corvette: The Fastest 50 Years. MWM gained access to GMs video vaults to discover long lost treasures with which to tell one of the most compelling automotive stories in history. Combined with great footage of everything from The Beatles to the Frisbee, this is a story of the corvette and our past as youve never seen it before.
title: Corvette: The Fastest 50 Years
